__data__.text:
Mini GPT-2 implementation from scratch | Github link(https://github.com/jasdeep06/nanoGpt-implementation) March 2024
 Implemented a decoder-only 124M parameter GPT-2 model from scratch using Pytorch.
 Implemented the multi head attention transformer architecture using native Pytorch.
 Trained and overfitted  the model on OpenWebText-100k dataset. 

   Retrieval Augmented Generation(RAG) application to chat with this resume | Github link | Link 
 Implemented a multimodal RAG application by indexing this resume, 8 blog posts(including all the images), 2 technical papers(including all the images), 2 project codebases.
 Implemented advanced indexing techniques like chunk references(parent-child), metadata references(summary) using LlamaIndex.
 Implemented advanced retrieval techniques like Cohere Reranking, Recursive retrieval, Router Query Engine and Query Enhancement using techniques like HyDe.
 Tech Stack - Python, Fast API, LlamaIndex, LangChain, LlamaHub, StreamLit, OpenAI
 You can chat with this resume here.

     Machine Learning Blog | Link(https://jasdeep06.github.io) 
 A popular machine learning blog consisting of posts ranging from explaining intricacies of backpropagation in pure python to implementing complex research papers 
 At its peak, it had a daily readership of 2.5k readers.
